name: Centene Corporation
summary: Centene Corporation is a leading American healthcare enterprise specializing in government-sponsored and commercial health programs, with a primary focus on Medicaid and Medicare. Headquartered in St. Louis, Centene serves millions of under-insured and uninsured individuals across the United States through managed care and specialty services. The company is publicly traded on the NYSE under the ticker CNC and ranked No. 25 on the 2023 Fortune 500 list.
